dict.string: Open in Adobe Acrobat for Windows

-- -- Get active app --
on run argv tell application "System Events" set activeApp to name of first application process whose frontmost is true log "Active app : " & activeApp end tell -- *** file name as variable doesn't work with unicode characters *** tell application id "com.runningwithcrayons.Alfred" set configuration "activeApp" to value activeApp in workflow (system attribute "alfred_workflow_bundleid") end tell end run

-- -- Get bookmarks all or filtered --
on run argv set theQuery to item 1 of argv
set activeApp to (system attribute "activeApp") if activeApp is not "ebook-viewer" then set theFile to getFile(activeApp) end if -- get bookmarks if length of theQuery is not 0 then -- filtered bookmarks if activeApp is equal to "ebook-viewer" then set cmd to "./jnana epub " & (quoted form of theQuery) else set cmd to "./jnana bmf " & (quoted form of theFile) & " " & (quoted form of theQuery) end if else -- all bookmarks if activeApp is equal to "ebook-viewer" then set cmd to "./jnana epub" else set cmd to "./jnana bm " & (quoted form of theFile) end if end if return do shell script cmd end run on getFile(activeApp) if activeApp is equal to "Preview" then return my Preview() else if activeApp is equal to "AdobeAcrobat" then return my AdobeAcrobat() else if activeApp is equal to "Skim" then return my Skim() else display notification "Some other app!" end if
return "" end getFile on Preview() tell application "Preview" return path of document 1 as text end tell end Preview on AdobeAcrobat() tell application "Adobe Acrobat" set currentFile to file alias of active doc end tell return POSIX path of currentFile end AdobeAcrobat -- on Skim() -- tell application "Skim" -- set currentFile to file of document 1 -- end tell -- return POSIX path of currentFile -- end Skim

on run argv set theQuery to item 1 of argv set theFile to do shell script "./jnana files" if length of theQuery is not 0 then -- search files set cmd to "./jnana files " & (quoted form of theQuery) else set cmd to "./jnana recent" end if return do shell script cmd end run

on run argv set theQuery to item 1 of argv tell application "System Events" set activeApp to name of first application process whose frontmost is true if activeApp = "Preview" then keystroke "g" using {option down, command down} -- ⌥⌘G keystroke theQuery delay 0.25 keystroke return keystroke return else if activeApp = "ebook-viewer" then do shell script "./jnana openepub " & (quoted form of theQuery) -- else if activeApp = "Skim" then -- tell application "Skim" -- set thePage to theQuery -- tell document 1 to go to page (thePage as integer) -- end tell else if activeApp = "AdobeAcrobat" then tell application "Adobe Acrobat" set thePage to theQuery -- tell PDF Window 1 to goto page (thePage as integer) tell PDF Window of active doc to goto page (thePage as integer) end tell else display notification "Some other app!" end if end tell set theFile to (system attribute "JNANA_FILE") -- update date read (date_accessed) do shell script "./jnana updateread " & (quoted form of theFile) -- -- remove variable for currently opened file -- set bundleID to (system attribute "alfred_workflow_bundleid") tell application id "com.runningwithcrayons.Alfred" -- remove configuration "JNANA_FILE" in workflow bundleID remove configuration "activeApp" in workflow bundleID end tell end run

on run argv set theQuery to item 1 of argv tell application "System Events" set activeApp to name of first application process whose frontmost is true if theQuery ends with "pdf" then -- PDF open per active app if activeApp = "Preview" then tell application "Preview" open POSIX file theQuery end tell else if activeApp = "AdobeAcrobat" then tell application "Adobe Acrobat" open (quoted form of theQuery) end tell end if else -- EPUB do shell script "./jnana openfile " & (quoted form of theQuery) end if
-- update date read (date_accessed) do shell script "./jnana updateread " & (quoted form of theQuery) end tell end run
on run argv tell application "System Events" set activeApp to name of first application process whose frontmost is true set theFile to do shell script "./jnana recent" end tell end run

on run argv set theQuery to item 1 of argv -- -- save query string -- set queryString to (system attribute "JNANA_QUERY") do shell script "./jnana savequery " & (quoted form of queryString) -- -- Split file and page/title destination -- set AppleScript's text item delimiters to " " set results to my explode("/Page:", theQuery) set theFile to item 1 of results as string set thePage to item 2 of results as string set fileAlias to POSIX file theFile as Unicode text -- -- vary actions by active app -- if fileAlias ends with ".pdf" then tell application "Finder" to open file fileAlias else set tocDestination to quoted form of thePage do shell script "./jnana openepub " & tocDestination & " " & quoted form of theFile return end if tell application "System Events" set activeApp to name of first application process whose frontmost is true log "Active app : " & activeApp end tell if activeApp = "Preview" then delay 0.25 tell application "Preview" try tell application "System Events" keystroke "g" using {option down, command down} -- ⌥⌘G keystroke thePage keystroke return keystroke return end tell end try end tell else if activeApp = "AdobeAcrobat" then my open_acrobat(fileAlias, thePage) -- else if activeApp = "Skim" then -- tell application "Skim" -- tell document 1 to go to page thePage -- end tell else display notification "Some other app!" end if
-- update date read (date_accessed) do shell script "./jnana updateread " & (quoted form of theFile) end run on open_acrobat(theFile, thePage) set documentOpened to false tell application "Adobe Acrobat" set documentName to "" -- Switch to document and page if open repeat with theDoc in documents set filePath to file alias of theDoc set posixPath to POSIX path of theFile if (filePath as string) is equal to (theFile as string) then set documentName to name of theDoc try bring to front document documentName end try tell PDF Window of document documentName to goto page (thePage as integer) set documentOpened to true exit repeat end if end repeat if documentOpened is not true then open file theFile options "page=" & thePage end if end tell end open_acrobat on explode(delimiter, input) local delimiter, input, ASTID set ASTID to AppleScript's text item delimiters try set AppleScript's text item delimiters to delimiter set input to text items of input set AppleScript's text item delimiters to ASTID return input --> list on error eMsg number eNum set AppleScript's text item delimiters to ASTID error "Can't explode: " & eMsg number eNum end try end explode

on run argv tell application "System Events" set theFile to do shell script "./jnana getepub" end tell
tell application "BBEdit" activate
set alreadyOpened to false repeat with appWindow in windows set openedFile to root directory of appWindow
if POSIX path of openedFile is equal to POSIX path of theFile then set index of appWindow to 1 set visible of appWindow to true set collapsed of appWindow to false
set alreadyOpened to true end if end repeat
if alreadyOpened is false then open POSIX file theFile end if end tell end run

on run argv if (system attribute "USE_JNANA2") is false then return do shell script "./jnana all " & quoted form of item 1 of argv else return do shell script "./jnana2 -a " & quoted form of item 1 of argv end if end run
on run argv set last_query to do shell script "./jnana lastquery" if last_query is not equal to "None" then set query to last_query end if end run

on run argv tell application "System Events" set theFile to do shell script "./jnana getepub" end tell
tell application "Sigil" activate open POSIX file theFile end tell end run

on run argv set theQuery to item 1 of argv
tell application "System Events" set activeApp to name of first application process whose frontmost is true end tell
if activeApp = "Preview" then set theFile to my Preview() else if activeApp = "ebook-viewer" then set theFile to do shell script "./jnana getepub" else if activeApp = "AcrobatPro" then set theFile to my AdobeAcrobat() end if
-- -- save subjects --
do shell script "./jnana subject " & (quoted form of theFile) & " " & (quoted form of theQuery) end run
on Preview() tell application "Preview" return path of document 1 end tell end Preview
on AdobeAcrobat() tell application "Adobe Acrobat" set currentFile to file alias of active doc end tell return POSIX path of currentFile end AdobeAcrobat

on run argv tell application "System Events" set activeApp to name of first application process whose frontmost is true log "Active app : " & activeApp end tell
if activeApp = "Preview" then set theFile to my Preview() else if activeApp = "ebook-viewer" then set theFile to do shell script "./jnana getepub" else if activeApp = "AcrobatPro" then set theFile to my AdobeAcrobat() -- else if activeApp = "Skim" then -- set theFile to my Skim() end if
-- -- save currently opened file as variable --
tell application "Alfred" set configuration "JNANA_FILE" to value (quoted form of theFile) in workflow system attribute "alfred_workflow_bundleid" end tell
-- -- get subjects/keywords --
set query to do shell script "./jnana subject " & (quoted form of theFile) end run
on Preview() tell application "Preview" return path of document 1 end tell end Preview
on AdobeAcrobat() tell application "Adobe Acrobat" set currentFile to file alias of active doc end tell return POSIX path of currentFile end AdobeAcrobat
-- on Skim() -- tell application "Skim" -- set currentFile to file of document 1 -- end tell -- return POSIX path of currentFile -- end Skim

on run argv set newFileName to item 1 of argv -- set theFile to (system attribute "JNANA_FILE") set theFile to do shell script "echo " & quoted form of (system attribute "JNANA_FILE") & " | iconv -f UTF-8-MAC -t MACROMAN" tell application "Finder" set fileAlias to POSIX file theFile as alias set name of fileAlias to newFileName & ".pdf" end tell -- -- remove variable for currently opened file -- set bundleID to (system attribute "alfred_workflow_bundleid") tell application "Alfred 4" to remove configuration "JNANA_FILE" in workflow bundleID end run

on run argv tell application "System Events" set activeApp to name of first application process whose frontmost is true if activeApp = "Preview" then set theFile to my Preview() else if activeApp = "AdobeAcrobat" then set theFile to my AdobeAcrobat() else if activeApp = "Skim" then set theFile to my Skim() else display notification "Some other app!" quit end if end tell
tell application "Finder" set fileName to name of (POSIX file theFile as alias) -- set fileName to my replace_chars(fileName, ".pdf", "") -- set fileName to my replace_chars(fileName, ".PDF", "") end tell
-- save currently opened file as variable tell application id "com.runningwithcrayons.Alfred" set configuration "JNANA_FILE" to value theFile in workflow (system attribute "alfred_workflow_bundleid") end tell return fileName end run on Preview() tell application "Preview" return path of document 1 as text end tell end Preview on AdobeAcrobat() tell application "Adobe Acrobat" set currentFile to file alias of active doc end tell return POSIX path of currentFile end AdobeAcrobat on replace_chars(this_text, search_string, replacement_string) set AppleScript's text item delimiters to the search_string set the item_list to every text item of this_text set AppleScript's text item delimiters to the replacement_string set this_text to the item_list as string set AppleScript's text item delimiters to "" return this_text end replace_chars

on run argv set theQuery to item 1 of argv
tell application "System Events" set activeApp to name of first application process whose frontmost is true if activeApp = "Preview" then set theFile to my Preview() else if activeApp = "AdobeAcrobat" then set theFile to my AdobeAcrobat() else if activeApp = "Skim" then set theFile to my Skim() else display notification "Some other app!" quit end if end tell
tell application "Finder" set fileAlias to POSIX file theFile as alias move fileAlias to POSIX file argv display notification "Moved to: " & argv end tell end run on Preview() tell application "Preview" return path of document 1 as text end tell end Preview on AdobeAcrobat() tell application "Adobe Acrobat" set currentFile to file alias of active doc end tell return POSIX path of currentFile end AdobeAcrobat

on run set theQuery to "{query}"
do shell script "/Applications/calibre.app/Contents/MacOS/ebook-viewer " & (quoted form of theQuery) end run

# Jnana
Alfred workflow to index eBook (EPUB & PDF) bookmarks. Filter bookmarks of current EPUB (calibre ebook-viewer) or PDF (Preview, Skim, and Acrobat) and go to page. Search index of all previously opened ebooks and open any of them to proper section.
Alfred 3.
## Usage
### Commands
.jna - search and go to bookmarks for currently opened ePub or PDF. .jnaall - bookmarks of any type
### Command-line
## Git
Repo : https://github.com/gennaios/alfred-jnana
